sub_title: Deputy Chief (Environment, Forest & Climate Change), BWDB, Dhaka, Bangladesh
summary: I have interest in planning and management of global water and environmental issues, Water and environmental policy analysis, Environmental system analysis and water and Environmental governance, Strategic environmental planning, Climate risk reduction & resilience, GIS technology for water and environmental management, Room for river and Nature based solution for water and environmental management, land reclamation and degraded aquatic ecosystem restoration, Environmental impact assessment, Environmental health and safety  compliance.
